flawed_nl_solution:
In five years, Phoebe will be 10+5 = <<10+5=13>>13 years old.
If Raven is four times as old as Phoebe in fifteen years, he will be 4*13 = <<4*13=52>>52 years old in 5 years.
Currently, Raven is 52-5 = <<52-5=47>>47 years old.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 13. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
